fields.name: Twasechela Goat Rearing and Gardening
fields.size_description: Total Land Area: 2.5Ha, 1 14mx4m Goat House, 1x3mx1.5 Diptank, 0.5Ha Garden, 1ha Pasture Field
fields.description: Integrated goat rearing and vegetable gardening. 2 male and 40 female goats to be procured. The subcomponent will incorporate pasture production to provide supplementary feed to the goats.

fields.name: Fichilisya vegetable Oil Production, Poultry and Gardening
fields.size_description: Total Land Area: 12Ha, 1 20m x 4m Poultry Hse. 150 Chickens, 1 Expelling Shed, 5Ha Crop Fields
fields.description: Establishment of a smallscale vegetable oil production plant integrated with poultry production and gardening

fields.name: Tutulane Goat Rearing and Gardening
fields.description: Integrated goat rearing and vegetable gardening. 2 male and 50 female goats to be procured. The subcomponent will incorporate pasture production to provide supplementary feed to the goats.

fields.name: Chilanga Fish Harvest, Winter Crop Farming, Poultry & Garden Project
fields.size_description: 2 fish ponds, 1 poultry house and 0.5Ha Garden
fields.description: Integration of aquaculture, livestock and crop production

fields.name: Wuyakwelelo Goat Rearing and Vegetable Gardening
fields.size_description: 1 goat house, 32 goats, 1 Ha pasture field, 1 store room.
fields.description: Integrated goat rearing and vegetable gardening. The subcomponent will incorporate pasture production to provide supplementary feed to the goats.

fields.name: Salamo Bulking center
fields.size_description: bulking center – 338.1m2, ablution block – 67.4m2 & residential area – 113.18m2
fields.description: The subcomponent involves construction of a bulking center which will include fencing, landscaping, construction of a residential house, ablution block, loading and offloading bay and a storage facility.

fields.description: The subcomponent involves construction of a bulking center which will include fencing, landscaping, construction of a residential house, ablution block, loading and offloading bay and a storage facility.

fields.name: Chibale Bulking Center

fields.description: The subcomponent involves construction of a bulking centers which will include fencing, landscaping, construction of a residential house, ablution block, loading and offloading bay and a rice storage facility.

fields.name: Kabulamwiko Bulking Centre
fields.size_description: The subcomponent will cover a total area of 588.43m2
fields.description: The subcomponent involves construction of a bulking centers which will include fencing, landscaping, construction of a residential house, ablution block, loading and offloading bay and a groundnuts, beans and finger millet storage facility.

fields.name: Dytech Honey Processing Project
fields.size_description: The subcomponent will cover a total area of 545.43m2
fields.description: Establishment of a honey processing plant that offtake comb honey from beekeepers in Kanchibiya and Lavushimanda
